reviews.review: I played it for a little bit then got it refunded, it's not bad it just feels very dated and less complex compared to CS:GO.
This game is Amazing in so many ways, CSGO cannot compete against this!

If you are looking for a modern competitive driven game, this is not it. Head to CS:GO for that.

If you are looking for a mod-friendly, community driven and diverse FPS game with an active playerbase.... Then this is the holy grail. A game with competitive elements, taken and made into a casual shooter with a variety of modes to play from, most mods are still the best on Source over GO/1.6

Buy this for the community and as a way to spend some time having fun and you will love it. Just understand that the players left are not here to compete. As a game, it still stands the test of time in 2015.
very good game love it and its old but awesome!

Great game! If you like CS 1.6 and want to upgrade to a better one, this is it! Better graphics, gameplay, the classic maps and many others to play, a lot of modes to enjoy the game. R.I.P my youth. 

Score: 8/10

Wow, womit soll ich nur anfangen?
Es ist ein sehr cooles Spiel, aber die Bots sind zu gut. Ich versuche die Geiseln zu retten, aber sie laufen gegen die Wand. Dann kommt ein Terrorist von hinten und verteilt Nosquopes. Man muss gut mit dem Team kooperieren, was für alte Strategen durchfall zu empfehlen ist. Allerdings muss man sagen, dass es besser wäre wenn man im nächsten Teil der CS-Reihe Kisten oder so für anders aussehende Waffen implemäntieren könnte. Das beste wären andere Messer die extrem selten sind.

PS: @Valve Ihr könntet dann im Community Market Profit scheffeln oder sogar Schlüssel für ca. 2,15€ einfügen, um richtig im Money zu baden.

I like this game for the GunGame custom server

Magnificent game in the Counter-Strike series it is a good FPS to hang around and laugh with friends without being too complicated, however it is a little buggy since the shooting mechanic is based off of a scan screen instead of actual projectile bullets, however this is only a minor hitch in the games overall quality, it is a fantastic time waster and finding people to hang with is really easy since it is the classic Counter-Strike.
For some reason, I keep coming back to this game, even though it enrages me. That must mean something is good about it.
Great old skool game that ill always come back to

Графический движок взят с Халф Лайф 2, это придаёт игре больше красочности, графичности и не требует сильных игровых данных. Всё тот же любимый всеми контр страйк, только тут уже и физика продуманная и красота персонажей и окружения и система повреждений. Мне также интересно в неё играть, как и в её предшественника, просто смотреть приятней на графику.
Рекомендую.
